typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer,
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as long,
		My_Rating as short,
		Date_Read as string,
		Date_Added as string,
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as boolean,
		Private_Notes as string,
		Read_Count as short,
		Original_Purchase_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVBookset2OUT
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer,
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as long,
		My_Rating as short,
		Date_Read as string,
		Date_Added as string,
		Original_Purchase_Date as string,
		Spoiler as string,
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		Private_Notes as string,
		Read_Count as short,
		My_Review as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVBookset3OUT
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer,
		ISBN as string,
		My_Rating as short,
		Date_Read as string,
		Date_Added as string,
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as string,
		Private_Notes as string,
		Read_Count as short,
		Original_Purchase_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVBookset4OUT
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer,
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as long,
		My_Rating as short,
		Date_Read as string,
		Date_Added as string,
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as string,
		Read_Count as short,
		Original_Purchase_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CSVBookset5OUT
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		Title as string,
		Author as string,
		{Author_l-f} as string,
		Additional_Authors as string,
		Average_Rating as float '0.00',
		Publisher as string,
		Binding as string,
		Number_of_Pages as integer '##0',
		Year_Published as integer '##0',
		Original_Publication_Year as integer '##0'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> BooksCSV
